body: We have `-Wmaybe-uninitialized` and `-Werror` enabled in the continuous build, which gets triggered by `operator-()`. I would also be happy with just disabling `-Wmaybe-uninitialized` because the signal-to-noise ratio is low (`-Wuninitialized` is much better).
body_html: We have -Wmaybe-uninitialized and -Werror enabled in the continuous build, which gets triggered by operator-(). I would also be happy with just disabling -Wmaybe-uninitialized because the signal-to-noise ratio is low (-Wuninitialized is much better).
